TerrainDef.label: tungsten tile
TerrainDef.description: Tungsten tiles, for that spaceship look. They are pretty, and the smooth tile surface gets a bonus to cleanliness.

TerrainDef.label: titanium tile
TerrainDef.description: Titanium tiles, for that spaceship look. They are pretty, and the smooth tile surface gets a bonus to cleanliness.

TerrainDef.label: titanium gold tile
TerrainDef.description: Titanium Gold tiles, for that beautiful spaceship look. They are very pretty but not considered fine floors. The smooth tile surface gets a bonus to cleanliness.

TerrainDef.label: grade v titanium tile
TerrainDef.description: Titanium tiles, for that spaceship look. They are pretty, and the smooth tile surface gets a bonus to cleanliness.

TerrainDef.label: palladium tile
TerrainDef.description: Exceptionally expensive, and exceptionally beautiful, palladium tiles will be the envy of your enemies. They get a bonus to cleanliness.

TerrainDef.label: palladium white gold tile
TerrainDef.description: Exceptionally expensive, and exceptionally beautiful, palladium white gold tiles will likely be the reason for your enemies attacks. They get a bonus to cleanliness.

TerrainDef.label: chrome tile
TerrainDef.description: Chrome tiles made from chromium, for that spaceship look. They are quite pretty, and the smooth tile surface gets a bonus to cleanliness.

TerrainDef.label: stainless steel tile
TerrainDef.description: Stainless steel tiles, for that spaceship look. They are pretty, and the smooth tile surface and corrosive resistive traits gets an extra bonus to cleanliness.

TerrainDef.label: electrum tile
TerrainDef.description: Very expensive, and very beautiful, electrum tiles will be the envy of your enemies. They get a bonus to cleanliness.

TerrainDef.label: aluminium tile
TerrainDef.description: Titanium tiles, for that spaceship look. They are pretty, and the smooth tile surface gets a bonus to cleanliness.
